title: The Swagman Summit Vertical Bike Rack
content:
There are many ways to carry bikes on road trips or on shuttle weekends and the Swagman Summit ($1,099.00 CAD) is the latest vertical rack to come across our radar…

The Swagman Summit is designed to fit into 2″ hitch receivers, with a four bike carrying capacity. This versatile mountain bike rack can carry fat bikes too–tire trays are wide enough for 5″ tires. The front wheel rests in zero-frame contact trays and has ratchet straps for tires.

To lower the rack, simply pull the yellow cam-lever, and then lower it or lift it back into place easily, even with bikes loaded, thanks to the integrated easy-assist gas shock. Enhanced security is offered with a threaded locking hitch pin, and two secure anchor points for use with 3rd party lock-and-chain systems.

Customize the fit of the rack on your vehicle with the two-position drawbar, and for larger groups, purchase the Add-On to maximize capacity to 6 bikes total.

Specs:

  • Zero frame contact vertical bike rack
  • Fits 2” Class 3 or higher receivers
  • Multiple anchor points for securing your bikes to the rack
  • Fat Tire compatible, up to 5” wide tires
  • Carries up to 60lb per bike
  • Works with most mountain bike tires from 1.9″-5″ wide*
  • Works with wheel sizes from 26″-29″
  • Integrated gas shock helps straighten bike rack after loading bikes in tilted position
  • Comes equipped with a locking threaded hitch pin that secures the rack to your vehicle and an integrated vertical anti-wobble pin to remove all wobble from the rack
  • Expandable to carry up to 6 bikes with 2 bike Add-On kit **
  • Stay-Saver attaches to pedal spindle to prevent pedal-chain stay contact during transit
  • Telescoping vertical mast for smaller storage size
  • Cam Level actuated tilting mechanism for easier loading of bikes
  • Two mounting positions on draw-bar for customizable fit to your vehicle
  • Built-in Bottle opener for apres drinks
  • Rack Weight: 70.4 lb

See more at Swagman.
